overview: Three friends find themselves desperately needing a divine intervention during the Christmas holidays.  One is the son of a kidnapped contractor working in the Middle East; one lost his job and is about to lose his family; and the other lost his faith when his mother died during the holidays.  Desperate times call for desperate measures, leading them to do the unthinkable.  Now their faith, dreams and hopes will be tested in this touching and inspirational movie.
tagline: Faith takes them on a magical journey to learn how to believe again
title: Christmas Tears
